# THIS FILE HAS BEEN GENERATED BY THE BUILD CONFIGURATION SYSTEM - DO NOT EDIT

set(MINECPP_STREAM_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR})

add_library(minecpp_stream STATIC)

# Public include headers
target_include_directories(minecpp_stream
  PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include
  PRIVATE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include/minecpp/stream
)

# Source subdirectory
add_subdirectory("src")

target_link_libraries(minecpp_stream
        LINK_PUBLIC
        minecpp_signal
        minecpp_container
        minecpp_network
        LINK_PRIVATE
        enet
)

add_subdirectory("example/client")

add_subdirectory("example/server")
